name: fastmail-calendar
description: Read, create, update, and delete Fastmail calendar events via JMAP. Supports time-blocking workflows and season-based batch scheduling.
author: Claude Cowork Plugin

FASTMAIL_API_TOKEN.description: Fastmail API token (Settings → Privacy & Security → Manage API tokens). Needs calendar read/write scope.

FASTMAIL_TIMEZONE.description: IANA timezone for interpreting relative dates (e.g., America/St_Johns, America/New_York).
